TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant sued the communication department of ORG of ORG for social benefits provided to former military officers by law .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of PERSON accepted the applicant 's action in part and awarded him MONEY ( ORG , MONEY ) . The judgment was not appealed against and became final .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued the applicant with a writ of execution . It also sent a copy of the writ to the defendant .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the writ of execution was returned to ORG because the defendant did not have funds to enforce the judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE a bailiff instituted enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was paid ORG .
